business_strategies.strategy: MMDD Framework - systematic daily feedback collection to identify and fix operational problems
business_strategies.implementation: Deploy feedback collection at multiple organizational touchpoints, analyze patterns, fix top issues or explain why they can't be fixed
business_strategies.expected_results: Improved operations, better employee satisfaction, reduced daily friction

business_strategies.case_study: Applied across all companies run and advised

steps: Set up feedback collection point (clipboard, Slack channel, app)
Fix top issues or explain why they can't be fixed

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Not explaining why certain problems can't be fixed immediately
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Staff continues to waste energy on unfixable issues, creates frustration
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Always communicate back - either fix the issue or explain why it can't be fixed right now
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Tell staff 'this is making everyone's day difficult, here's why we can't fix it right now, so don't spend your energy on it'

metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Match feedback frequency to pace of organizational change
